dc_description_s: Shows township and range, private claims, county boundaries, land district boundaries, towns, railroads, water features, and townships containing coal. Also shows Indian, military and forest reservations.; At head of title: Department of the Interior, General Land Office, William A. Richards, Commissioner.; Dec. 19 1906 -- title section.; S Doc 194 59 2-- lower right margin.; Insets: Leadville -- City of Denver -- Cripple Creek.|36 x 43 Centimeters, on sheet 40 x 46|Scale 1:1,520,640. 1 inch equals 24 miles|General Map Collection
dc_publisher_s: Andrew B. Graham Co., Photo-Lithographers (Washington, D.C)
